verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer, Till I am wholly lost in Thee. Sweet will of God, still fold me closer, Till I am wholly lost in Thee.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Thy precious will, O conqu’ring Savior, Doth now embrace and compass me; All discords hushed, my peace a river, My soul, a prisoned bird set free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Shut in with Thee, O Lord, forever, My wayward feet no more to roam; What pow’r from Thee my soul can sever? The center of God’s will my home.
